jobTitle: Amazon Delivery Driver - Los Angeles County - Work with great people!
industry: Retail, Computers and Electronics Manufacturing, and Manufacturing
description:
DRIVER FOR QX LOGISTIX Last Mile Deliveries

$250 Sign-on Bonus for Experienced Drivers after 3 months!

Get a Raise Every 6 Months for Good Performance!

Employee of the Month Program - $ 100 gift cards

QX Logistix, a warehouse services and transportation company, is looking for Delivery Drivers, to deliver packages for Amazon. We hire committed, positive people, who have a desire to excel in whatever they do. We value associates who have an optimistic attitude and enjoy working in a fast paced, changing, physical environment. Positions available in Hawthorne and Rosemead in Los Angeles County.

Job Description

Full time driver & delivery person for residential and commercial locations in Los Angeles County

Deliver 220+ packages a day

Work 4 days out of the week based on 9-10 hour shifts, Monday through Sunday - various morning shifts available

Keep company provided vehicle clean

Fuel vehicle with company card

Important Traits

Reliable

Great attitude, will go the extra mile to get the job done efficiently

Energetic, moves quickly

Loves to drive and practices safe driving

Understands great customer service

Enjoys being part of a team

Other Requirements

1+ years of work-related driving/delivering experience

1+ years experience driving a cargo van or large vehicle

Must be able to lift, push, pull up to 50 lbs

Must be at least 21 years old

Good driving record

Must consent to drug/alcohol screen & background verification

Salary: $15.50 per hour

Benefits: Paid Sick Leave, Paid Vacation, Health Insurance, Competitive Bonus

We look forward to hearing from you.
